document.full_text: taliban militants attacked two buses carrying navy officials in pakistan's southern city of karachi on tuesday, killing four people and wounding 56, officials said, the first major attack on the military in the city in seven years.
document.title: taliban attack two navy buses in karachi, 4 dead
lines_and_colors: taliban militants attacked two buses carrying navy officials in pakistan's southern city of karachi on tuesday, killing four people and wounding 56, officials said, the first major attack on the military in the city in seven years.
